biography: Veeraswamy Ravichandaran or V. Ravichandaran (Kannada: ವಿ .ರವಿಚಂದ್ರನ್; born 30 May 1960) is an Indian actor, director, producer, music director, editor and lyricist who primarily works in theKannada film industry. He is the son of notable film producer N. Veerasami. As a producer, he continues to run his father's production house, "Sri Eswari Productions", which produces his own films.
name: V. Ravichandran
